adventure_overview: Learning teamwork, good sportsmanship, and having fun with their family or den by playing outdoor games or sports in packed into this Adventure including attending a sporting event together. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Play an active game with your den. Share with your Tiger adult partner or your den why you like this game.

activities.name: Tiger Duck Duck Goose
activities.description: Play a game of duck, duck, goose.

activities.name: Tiger Hide and Seek
activities.description: Play a game of hide and  seek .

requirements.text: Play a relay game with your den.Â  Share with your Tiger adult partner or your den why you like this game.

activities.name: Tiger Passing the Ball Relay
activities.description: Play Passing the Ball Relay race.

requirements.text: Discuss what it means to be a good sport in a game with your Tiger adult partner or other Tigers.

activities.name: Referee Visit
activities.description: Invite someone who is a referee (volunteer or professional) to discuss sportsmanship with the den.

activities.name: Who is Being a Good Sport
activities.description: Cub Scouts complete activity in the Tiger handbook to  identify  good sportsmanship.
